content: crochet dinosaur backpack pattern crochet childs backpack pattern crochet dinosaur pattern crochet pattern digital download this listing is for a digital download of my crochet crafty boho slippers crochet pattern not the finished item - this crochet dinosaur backpack is so adorable and makes a perfect gift for any little boy or girl in your life - pattern includes 75 photos to help you with every step - the pattern also includes a printer-friendly version with no pictures - i have labeled this pattern beginner to intermediate only because there s a couple of techniques beginners may not be familiar with but they re easy and fun to learn *********************************************************************************** disclaimer this is a pdf crochet pattern to make crochet dinosaur backpack not the actual finished item there will be no refunds for failure to read the listing details this listing is clearly for a crochet pattern thank you *********************************************************************************** sizes one size skill level beginner to intermediate terminology this pattern is written in standard us crochet terms in english only materials some with affiliate links worsted weight yarn color a backpack worsted weight yarn color b spikes and drawstrings 4 0mm crochet hook | https //amzn to/2i7wacc 4 5mm crochet hook | https //amzn to/2k4nivm scissors tapestry needle stitch markers or scrap yarn pattern copyright please do not copy redistribute or sell my pattern in any way you are more than welcome to sell your finished crochet dinosaur backpack i hope they are a very hot item for you you may not use my pictures and pass them off as your own for they are my property thank you for your understanding if you do post any pictures of your dinosaur backpack i would love to see them you can use the #dinobackpack or #acraftyconcept so i can see and so other makers can find the pattern for themselves i truly believe there are enough customers to go around so sharing information is a great way for us makers to inspire and encourage each other i can t wait to see your finished crochet dinosaur backpack refund due to the electronic nature of my patterns i cannot offer refunds thank you for understanding
